data.current_summary: Performs introspection of the provided Bearer JWT token
data.description_suggestion: Introspects the provided Bearer JWT token to validate and retrieve token metadata. Returns token claims, expiration, and validity status. Requires a valid JWT SA token in the Authorization header. Use this to verify token authenticity and extract token information for authentication decisions.
data.reasoning: Description is completely empty, leaving AI agents unable to understand what data is returned or how to use the operation. Added details about return values (token claims, expiration, validity), authentication requirements, and use cases for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Retrieves events for both successful and failed attempts to sign into a 1Password account
data.current_description: This endpoint requires your JSON Web Token to have the *signinattempts* feature.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves sign-in attempt events (both successful and failed) for a 1Password account. Requires JWT SA token with the *signinattempts* feature. Accepts filtering and pagination parameters in the request body. Returns a collection of SignInAttempt objects containing timestamp, user, client metadata, location, and attempt status. Use this to audit authentication activity and detect suspicious sign-in patterns.
data.reasoning: Current description only mentions token requirements but omits critical details about inputs (filtering/pagination), outputs (SignInAttempt schema), and use cases. Enhanced description helps AI agents understand what data to send and expect, and when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Retrieves events for each usage of an item stored in a shared vault within a 1Password account
data.current_description: This endpoint requires your JSON Web Token to have the *itemusages* feature.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves item usage events for items accessed in shared vaults within a 1Password account. Requires JWT SA token with the *itemusages* feature. Accepts filtering and pagination parameters in the request body. Returns a collection of ItemUsage objects containing timestamp, user, item metadata, action type, and vault information. Use this to track item access patterns and monitor vault activity.
data.reasoning: Current description only mentions token requirements but omits critical details about inputs (filtering/pagination), outputs (ItemUsage schema), and use cases. Enhanced description helps AI agents understand what data to send and expect, and when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Retrieves audit events for actions performed by team members within a 1Password account
data.current_description: This endpoint requires your JSON Web Token to have the *auditevents* feature.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves audit events for actions performed by team members within a 1Password account. Requires JWT SA token with the *auditevents* feature. Accepts filtering and pagination parameters in the request body. Returns a collection of AuditEvent objects containing timestamp, actor, action type, object type, and detailed event metadata. Use this to monitor team activities, track administrative changes, and maintain compliance records.
